input.sentences: the family began their day at an outdoor bookfair .
there was live entertainment in the park
we had a selection of places to stop | eat and rest
there was even a running tournament that we watched .
there was also plenty of games for the children to actively participate
output.sentences: Today we had an out door family day.
We found a park with live entertainment.
We had a few selections to stop and rest.
We got to watch a running tournament on our outing.
There were plenty of things to participate in while we were out.
